remarks.para: One may be inoperative off provided associated EICAS message is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard affected L (R) GEN CONT switch "DRIVE LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Verify associated EICAS message operates normally as follows:
Disconnect affected IDG by pushing the disconnect switch on the overhead panel.
Verify the associated EICAS message (L/R GEN DRIVE) is displayed:
Return aircraft to normal configuration (reconnect affected IDG).
